title: theme
description: theme schema for 4D Write Pro table wizard

default.description: Object containing the default style applicable to all rows.

table.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the table.

rows.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to all rows.

cells.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to all cells.

header1.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the first header row.

header2.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the second header row.

header3.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the third header row.

header4.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the fourth header row.

header5.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the fifth header row.

headers.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the header rows if no specific header row is defined.

data.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the repeated data row.

break1.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the first break row.

break2.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the second break row.

break3.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the third break row.

break4.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the fourth break row.

break5.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the fifth break row.

breaks.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the break row, if no specific break row is defined.

bcor.description: Object containing the style definition applicable to the bottom carry-over row.
